short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate the average number of guesses from the Wordle stats graph

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you love Wordle, you probably look at the graph it shows you after you complete a puzzle. It shows how many times you've solved in 3 guesses, 4 guesses, etc.

This plugin will read that graph and tell you the average number of guesses it's taking you.
